faq.question: How is this different from Ctrl+F?
faq.answer: Ctrl+F only finds exact word matches. Our AI understands meaning and context, so you can find information even if the exact words don't appear in the document.

faq.question: Can I search multiple PDFs at once?
faq.answer: Yes! Upload multiple documents and ask questions. AI will search across all of them and tell you which document contains the answer.

faq.question: Does it work with scanned documents?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We use advanced OCR to extract text from scanned PDFs and images, making them fully searchable.

faq.question: Can I search by concept, not just keywords?
faq.answer: Yes! Ask 'What are the safety requirements?' and AI will find all relevant safety information, regardless of specific wording.

faq.question: Are page references included?
faq.answer: Yes. Every answer includes page numbers so you can verify the source and read more context if needed.

faq.question: What's included in each plan?
faq.answer: Free: 5 searches/month. Starter ($9/mo): 50 searches. Pro ($19/mo): 200 searches + multi-document search. Team ($49/mo): unlimited.
